chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:

zero: poly

cb_zerop: forall (L : list poly) (p : poly), zerop p -> cb L p
cb_incl: forall (L1 L2 : list poly) (p : poly), incl L1 L2 -> cb L1 p -> cb L2 p
nf_cb: forall (p : poly) (L : list poly), cb (p :: L) (nf L p)
cb_trans: forall (L : list poly) (p q : poly), cb (p :: L) q -> cb L p -> cb L q
cb_comp: forall L1 L2 : list poly, (forall p : poly, In p L1 -> cb L2 p) -> forall q : poly, cb L1 q -> cb L2 q
cb_nf: forall (p : poly) (L : list poly), cb (nf L p :: L) p
cb_compo: forall (p : poly) (L1 : list poly), cb L1 p -> forall L2 : list poly, (forall q : poly, In q L1 -> cb L2 q) -> cb L2 p
zerop_elim_cb: forall (L : list poly) (p q : poly), zerop p -> cb (p :: L) q -> cb L q
grobner_def: forall L : list poly, grobner L -> forall p : poly, cb L p -> zerop p \/ (exists q : poly, reduce L p q)
def_grobner: forall L : list poly, (forall p : poly, cb L p -> zerop p \/ (exists q : poly, reduce L p q)) -> grobner L
nf_div: forall (p : poly) (L : list poly), ~ zerop p -> ~ zerop (nf L p) -> exists q : poly, In q (nf L p :: L) /\ divp p q /\ ~ zerop q
div_reduce: forall (p : poly) (L1 L2 : list poly), (forall r1 : poly, In r1 L1 -> ~ zerop r1 -> exists r2 : poly, In r2 L2 /\ divp r1 r2) -> forall q : poly, reduce L1 p q -> exists r : poly, reduce L2 p r
divp_id: forall p : poly, divp p p
divp_trans: transitive poly divp
nf_div_zero1: forall (p : poly) (L : list poly), ~ zerop p -> zerop (nf L p) -> exists q : poly, In q L /\ divp p q /\ ~ zerop q
nf_div_zero: forall (p : poly) (L : list poly), ~ zerop p -> zerop (nf L p) -> exists q : poly, In q L /\ divp p q /\ ~ zerop q

forall (L : list poly) (p : poly), In p L -> ~ zerop p -> exists q : poly, In q (red L) /\ divp p q /\ ~ zerop q

redacc_divp : forall (L1 L2 : list poly) (p : poly), ~ zerop p -> In p (L1 ++ L2) -> exists q : poly, In q (redacc L1 L2 ++ L2) /\ divp p q /\ ~ zerop q
zerop_nf_cb : forall (L : list poly) (p : poly), zerop (nf L p) -> cb L p
cb_red_cb1 : forall (p : poly) (L : list poly), cb L p -> cb (red L) p
cb_red_cb2 : forall (p : poly) (L : list poly), cb (red L) p -> cb L p
cb_red : forall (L : list poly) (p : poly), In p L -> cb (red L) p
red_cb : forall (L : list poly) (p : poly), In p (red L) -> cb L p
cb_redacc : forall (L1 L2 : list poly) (p : poly), In p L1 -> cb (redacc L1 L2 ++ L2) p
redacc_cb : forall (L1 L2 : list poly) (p : poly), In p (redacc L1 L2) -> cb (L1 ++ L2) p
redacc = fun H' : list poly => list_rec (fun _ : list poly => list poly -> list poly) (fun _ : list poly => nil) (fun (a : poly) (p : list poly) (Rec : list poly -> list poly) (Acc : list poly) => LetP poly (list poly) (nf (p ++ Acc) a) (fun (u : poly) (_ : u = nf (p ++ Acc) a) => if zerop_dec u then Rec Acc else u :: Rec (u :: Acc))) H' : list poly -> list poly -> list poly Arguments redacc (_ _)%list_scope
Inductive eq_dep (U : Type) (P : U -> Type) (p : U) (x : P p) : forall q : U, P q -> Prop := eq_dep_intro : EqdepFacts.eq_dep U P p x p x Arguments EqdepFacts.eq_dep _%type_scope _%function_scope Arguments EqdepFacts.eq_dep_intro _%type_scope _%function_scope
Refl.make_conj_in : forall (A : Type) (eval : A -> Prop) (l : list A), Refl.make_conj eval l -> forall p : A, In p l -> eval p
EnvRing.Pol_ind : forall (C : Type) (P : EnvRing.Pol C -> Prop), (forall c : C, P (EnvRing.Pc c)) -> (forall (p : BinNums.positive) (p0 : EnvRing.Pol C), P p0 -> P (EnvRing.Pinj p p0)) -> (forall p : EnvRing.Pol C, P p -> forall (p0 : BinNums.positive) (p1 : EnvRing.Pol C), P p1 -> P (EnvRing.PX p p0 p1)) -> forall p : EnvRing.Pol C, P p
ZMicromega.vars = fix vars (jmp : BinNums.positive) (p : EnvRing.Pol BinNums.Z) {struct p} : list BinNums.positive := match p with | EnvRing.Pc _ => nil | EnvRing.Pinj j p0 => vars (BinPos.Pos.add j jmp) p0 | EnvRing.PX p0 _ q => jmp :: vars jmp p0 ++ vars (BinPos.Pos.succ jmp) q end : BinNums.positive -> EnvRing.Pol BinNums.Z -> list BinNums.positive Arguments ZMicromega.vars _%positive_scope

```coq
intros L p Hp Hnp.
assert (Hcb: cb L p) by (apply cb_id; auto).
assert (Hnfcb: cb (nf L p :: L) p) by (apply cb_nf; auto).
assert (Hredcb: cb (red L) p) by (apply cb_red; auto).
assert (Hnfzerop: ~ zerop (nf L p)) by (intro H; apply Hnp; apply zerop_nf_cb; auto).
assert (Hredacc: exists q, In q (redacc L nil) /\ divp p q /\ ~ zerop q) by (apply redacc_divp; auto).
destruct Hredacc as [q [Hinq Hdivpq Hzq]].
exists q; split; [apply in_red | ]; split; auto.
Qed.

original: intros L p Hp Hnp. assert (Hcb: cb L p) by (apply cb_id; auto). assert (Hnfcb: cb (nf L p :: L) p) by (apply cb_nf; auto). assert (Hredcb: cb (red L) p) by (apply cb_red; auto). assert (Hnfzerop: ~ zerop (nf L p)) by (intro H; apply Hnp; apply zerop_nf_cb; auto). assert (Hredacc: exists q, In q (redacc L nil) /\ divp p q /\ ~ zerop q) by (apply redacc_divp; auto). destruct Hredacc as [q [Hinq Hdivpq Hzq]]. exists q; split; [apply in_red | ]; split; auto.
